Name: Cinnamon Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with a dusting of cinnamon powder.
Review: A subtle spicy cinnamon taste with tangy length.
History: Created in 1999 by Porik at Che, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cinnamon Daiquiri contains 168 calories
